text: @maddow COVID-19 and tear gas may prove to be a deadly combination.  After tear gassing the peaceful protesters the unmasked Trump and staff walk through the park for the photo op.  The protesters wore masks. His party may get to experience, in a week or two COVID-19--perfect specimens.
